content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Real Madrid 4.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Real Madrid 4.
Offside, Real Madrid. Marcelo tries a through ball, but Gareth Bale is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Marcelo (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Isco.
Attempt missed. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right misses to the left.
Attempt saved. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cristiano Ronaldo.
Goal!  Almería 1, Real Madrid 4. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Daniel Carvajal.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Raphael Varane.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Fábio Coentrão replaces Karim Benzema.
